text: int main ( ) { int T ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; while ( T -- ) { long int N ; scanf ( "%ld" , & N ) ; long int a [ N ] , i , s = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < N ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ i ] ) ; } i = 0 ; while ( i < N - 1 ) { if ( a [ i ] < a [ i + 1 ] ) { s = s + a [ i ] ; } else if ( a [ i + 1 ] < a [ i ] ) { s = s + a [ i + 1 ] ; } else { } i = i + 1 ; } printf ( "%ld\n" , s ) ; } return 0 ; }
